sonatas.name: Gusts of Welkin
sonatas.description: A sonata that resonates with the power of the wind, allowing the wearer to harness the freedom of the skies.

effects.4piece: After using a Forte Skill, increases Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 18% for 8s

sonatas.name: Thundering Fury
sonatas.description: A sonata that channels the raw power of lightning, crackling with electric energy.

effects.4piece: After using a Forte Skill, the next Basic Attack has a 80% chance to deal 40% additional Electro DMG

sonatas.name: Blazing Heart
sonatas.description: A sonata that burns with passionate flames, igniting the spirit of the wearer.

effects.4piece: When HP is above 70%, increases CRIT Rate by 12% and CRIT DMG by 24%

sonatas.name: Frozen Eternity
sonatas.description: A sonata that preserves the essence of ice, offering both protection and deadly cold.

effects.4piece: After using a Forte Skill, creates a shield equal to 20% of Max HP for 10s. While shielded, increases DMG by 15%

sonatas.name: Chaotic Entropy
sonatas.description: A sonata that embraces the unpredictable nature of chaos, constantly shifting and changing.

effects.4piece: After using a Forte Skill, gain a random buff for 10s: 25% ATK, 20% CRIT DMG, or 12% CRIT Rate

sonatas.name: Radiant Dawn
sonatas.description: A sonata that shines with the brilliance of the morning sun, revealing hidden truths.

effects.4piece: After using a Forte Skill, increases all Elemental DMG by 12% for 8s

sonatas.name: Warrior's Will
sonatas.description: A sonata that embodies the determination of a warrior, never yielding in the face of adversity.

effects.4piece: After defeating an enemy, increases ATK by 15% for 15s, stacks up to 3 times

sonatas.name: Ocean's Embrace
sonatas.description: A sonata that captures the vast depths of the sea, both nurturing and overwhelming.

effects.4piece: When healing an ally, 30% of the healing amount is converted to a shield that lasts for 8s
